-    fsqrts,

@@ -58,17 +41,0 @@
-    fsqrt_m               = (1 << fsqrt  ),
-    fsqrts_m              = (1 << fsqrts ),
-    isel_m                = (1 << isel   ),
-    lxarxeh_m             = (1 << lxarxeh),
-    cmpb_m                = (1 << cmpb   ),
-    popcntb_m             = (1 << popcntb),
-    popcntw_m             = (1 << popcntw),
-    fcfids_m              = (1 << fcfids ),
-    vand_m                = (1 << vand   ),
-    lqarx_m               = (1 << lqarx  ),
-    vcipher_m             = (1 << vcipher),
-    vpmsumb_m             = (1 << vpmsumb),
-    mfdscr_m              = (1 << mfdscr ),
-    vsx_m                 = (1 << vsx    ),
-    ldbrx_m               = (1 << ldbrx  ),
-    stdbrx_m              = (1 << stdbrx ),
-    vshasig_m             = (1 << vshasig),
@@ -104,1 +70,0 @@
-  static bool has_mfdscr()  { return (_features & mfdscr_m) != 0; }
